title: Two Old Judges to Sell or Trade
author: kkkkandp

posts.post_title: Two Old Judges to Sell or Trade
posts.post_content:
Two very nice graded Old Judges available. 

Would prefer an exchange (partial or total) for similarly conditioned items on my want list: Hub Collins, Frank Hankinson, Kid Madden (pose 288-7), Joe Miller (pose 324-3 or 324-4), Jack O’Brien (not pose 349-1), Joe Quinn (not pose 376-1 or 376-4), Charles Reynolds, Sam Smith, Taylor Shafer, Harry Vaughn, William Veach, William Weaver, Jake Wells.

Would consider buy requests as well. Decker $225 OBO delivered. Holliday $330 OBO delivered. Make me an offer I can't refuse! :D
